description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. AVATOUR - Hide & Seek - Miami Mission. Go to Miami to Play Hide & Seek with NPC Avatars and Complete Missions. Find Avatars to UnLock more of the Map. Use 4D Power to go thru Objects to look for others, use AntiGravity Power to Fly up to others, also go underground. Use a Car, Boat, Helicopter, Jet or Walk with Your Avatar.                                 GAMES.ARCHOR.COM
